meanings.definition: Physical weakness or lack of strength.
meanings.sent1: After being sick for a week, she felt asthenia in her muscles.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the patient with asthenia due to his low muscle mass.
meanings.sent3: The weightlifter joked that lifting a feather caused asthenia in his arms.
meanings.sent4: The old bridge showed signs of asthenia, unable to bear heavy loads anymore.
meanings.sent5: The asthenia in the tree branches made them bend easily in the wind.

meanings.sent1: The long work hours left him feeling asthenia by the end of the day.
meanings.sent2: She drank an energy drink to combat the asthenia she felt after the workout.
meanings.sent3: The lazy cat blamed its asthenia on the lack of sunshine in the room.
meanings.sent4: The dying fire symbolized the asthenia of the once lively party.
meanings.sent5: The asthenia of the plant was evident in its wilting leaves.
